delete_all_help.description: Help text for Delete All button.

guide.message:
Place the cursor before, in or after your abbreviations and hit your defined shortcut (default 'Ctrl + Space') to expand them. You could save your new keys with your 'Ctrl + s' or by hitting the save button. There are some additional parameters, which could be included in your own abbreviations: %CLIPBOARD% The contents of the system clipboard at the time of shortcut expansion will replace this parameter in the expansion definition.
Current day:%d (deprecated: %DAY%)
Current month:%m (deprecated: %MONTH%)
Current year:%Y (deprecated: %YEAR%)
Current hour:%H
Current minute:%M
Current second:%S
Curent timezone offset:%z
The complete date (today):%DATE% To add days, months or years to the current date:
days:%DATE<operator><n>d%
month:%DATE<operator><n>m%
years:%DATE<operator><n>y%
or:%DATE<operator><n>d<n>m<n>y%
You have to replace <operator> with + or - and <n> by a number of your choice. Abbreviations with Argument Pattern: An expansion may also replace text matched by a user-supplied argument pattern. Argument pattern and definition are used as the arguments to String.prototype.replace (searchValue, replaceValue) and allow searching for arguments after abbreviations and replacing them inside of the replacement value. e.g. Abbreviation tbug Argument Pattern \s+(\d+)\s+(\w+) Expand to... "Hello $$2! Please see http://code.google.com/p/trnsfrmr/issues/detail?id=$$1 for details. " will allow a boilerplate response with two arguments to expand from tbug 35 joshuato to following personalized reply: Hello joshuato! Please see http://code.google.com/p/trnsfrmr/issues/detail?id=35 for details. Undo of abbreviation expansion: This works by using the shortcut key again, but only when "Select after replace" is checked.

changelog_text.message: Please visit http://code.google.com/p/trnsfrmr/ for more information. New in Version 1.9 Make Save button available above individual tabs. Tab key navigation now moves through all text fields of an abbreviation. Many bug fixes (prompted by changes to gmail, current Goolge Chrome versions). New in Version 1.8 Download of abbreviations to Download folder. Import of download files by drop onto Text dropzone. WYSIWYG editing of abbreviation, arguments, and expansion text. Headers remain visible when tabs are scrolled. Popchrom issue reporting integrated in context menu. New variable %CLIPBOARD% available in abbreviation definitions. Several bugfixes. Improved reporting via dialog boxes.

keys_not_unique.message: The abbreviations have to be unique.
